Set.Text: We are a [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Bountiful[ENDCOLOR] people and we can help accelerate your civilization's [ICON_FOOD] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Growth[ENDCOLOR].
A befriended [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Bountiful[ENDCOLOR] City-State will boost the [ICON_FOOD] Food of your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital when Friends, and all of your cities when Allies.

As a [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Bountiful[ENDCOLOR] City-State, they will export Food to your empire (+{1_NumCapitalFood}[ICON_FOOD]in [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital, +{2_NumCitiesFood}[ICON_FOOD]in all other Cities).

As a [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Bountiful[ENDCOLOR] City-State, they now make large Food exports to your empire (additional +{1_NumCapitalFood}[ICON_FOOD]in [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital, +{2_NumCitiesFood}[ICON_FOOD]in all other Cities).
